body:
I figured out how to solve my problem. I put this piece of code right after I pick a new date:

Fragment frg = null;
                frg = getSupportFragmentManager().findFragmentById(R.id.pager);
                final FragmentTransaction ft = getSupportFragmentManager().beginTransaction();
                ft.detach(frg);
                ft.attach(frg);
                ft.commit();

Where "pager" is the space in the activity layout where I load the Fragment. It works perfectly!
title: Android: Reload Fragment inside an Activity
